title: Yelpy
description: Yelp for Friends! This website was made during LA Hacks 2015.

steps.title: Login Page
steps.text: Pretty neat right? The functionalities are still basic. You can register using username and password, or login. The top search bar could also be used to search for users. You need to be logged in to comment and rate though.

steps.title: Welcome Page
steps.text: This is the welcome page. Here we put some legal disclaimers and rules. We encourage users to behave nicely, and we acknowledge that some troll users might use our service to bully other people. Thus we state it on our welcome page.

steps.title: Profile Page
steps.text: By clicking the user's profile page, the user could edit their profile. The user could also see any comments or rating from other users.

steps.title: Friend's Page
steps.text: Through the search field on the navigation bar users can search other users. User's then could rate and comment publicly on the other user's profile picture.

steps.title: Rate and Comment!
steps.text: User can give rating in the form of hearts and comment about anything. Once the user hit submit it will be updated automatically to the server.
